name: Fragarach
shortDescription: The Answerer - Sword of Truth and Final Retort
fullDescription:
The Answerer - Sword of Truth and Final Retort Fragarach (Old Irish: "The Answerer" or "The Retaliator"), also known as Freagarthach or the
                    Sword of Air, stands among the most legendary weapons in Celtic mythology. This magical blade
                    belonged to Manannan mac Lir, the sea god and ruler of the Otherworld island of Tir na nOg,
                    before being passed to Lugh Lamhfada, the master of all arts and champion of the Tuatha De Danann.

properties.name: Origin
properties.value: Forged in the Otherworld by the gods

properties.name: Primary Power
properties.value: Compels truth, cuts through any armor, controls wind
